IsEnabled.Title: Enabled
IsEnabled.Description: Whether to display an anchor indicator on top of the card pile the <c=card>Anchor</c> is currently in.

IsEnabled.Title: Enabled
IsEnabled.Description: When enabled, makes it possible to look at the card piles when peeking the game state during other actions.

Tooltip.Title: Card Marking
Tooltip.Description: Choose a color and a symbol, then click on a card to mark it. The mark will also appear on the pile the card is in.

ClearTooltip.Title: Clear Marks
ClearTooltip.Description: When selected, clicking on a card will clear all of its marks.

IsEnabled.Title: Enabled
IsEnabled.Description: When enabled, allows applying markers to cards, which get shown on the cards themselves, but also the piles the card are in.

AutoMarkCharacterCards.Title: Auto-mark character cards
AutoMarkCharacterCards.Description: Automatically apply a unique symbol in the character's color to their cards. Display that same symbol on the character's frame.

Draw.Title: In Draw Pile
Draw.Description: The card is in the draw pile.

Hand.Title: In Hand
Hand.Description: The card is in your hand.

Discard.Title: In Discard Pile
Discard.Description: The card is in the discard pile.

Display.Title: Show card pile
Display.Description: Whether to show the pile each card is currently in when choosing a card for an action.

IsEnabled.Title: Enabled
IsEnabled.Description: Whether to use the compact font for tooltips.

ShipCategory.Title: Enable "Ship" category
ShipCategory.Description: Whether ship-specific artifacts should be moved to their own category in the codex.

EventCategory.Title: Enable "Event" category
EventCategory.Description: Whether event artifacts should be moved to their own category in the codex.

IsEnabled.Title: Enabled
IsEnabled.Description: Whether to display dividers between the lanes in combat.

ActiveDisplayStyle.Title: Active display style
ActiveDisplayStyle.Description: The style to use for the lane divider when hovering over any kind of movement or offset action.

InactiveDisplayStyle.Title: Inactive display style
InactiveDisplayStyle.Description: The style to use for the lane divider when not hovering over any kind of movement or offset action.

ActiveAlpha.Title: Active alpha
ActiveAlpha.Description: The opacity of the lane divider when hovering over any kind of movement or offset action.

InactiveAlpha.Title: Inactive alpha
InactiveAlpha.Description: The opacity of the lane divider when not hovering over any kind of movement or offset action.

ActiveSpeed.Title: Active speed
ActiveSpeed.Description: The speed at which the lane divider moves vertically when hovering over any kind of movement or offset action.

InactiveSpeed.Title: Inactive speed
InactiveSpeed.Description: The speed at which the lane divider moves vertically when not hovering over any kind of movement or offset action.

IsEnabled.Title: Enabled
IsEnabled.Description: Whether to replace the usual hand card browse screen with a less intrusive version of it.

IsEnabled.Title: Enabled
IsEnabled.Description: Whether to replace status rendering with bars (like <c=status>shards</c>).

SwitchToTwoRows.Title: Switch to two rows
SwitchToTwoRows.Description: Whether the status should be split into 2 rows of bars if the max threshold is high enough.

SwitchToTwoRowsAt.Title: Switch to two rows at
SwitchToTwoRowsAt.Description: The minimum threshold at which the status should be split into 2 rows of bars.

SwitchToThreeRows.Title: Switch to three rows
SwitchToThreeRows.Description: Whether the status should be split into 3 rows of bars if the max threshold is high enough.

SwitchToThreeRowsAt.Title: Switch to three rows at
SwitchToThreeRowsAt.Description: The minimum threshold at which the status should be split into 3 rows of bars.

SwitchToNumbers.Title: Switch to numbers
SwitchToNumbers.Description: Whether the status should be rendered as text, but including the threshold (for example, <c=redd>1/3</c>).

SwitchToNumbersAt.Title: Switch to numbers at
SwitchToNumbersAt.Description: The minimum threshold at which the status should be rendered as text, but including the threshold (for example, <c=redd>1/3</c>).

IrrelevantAt.Title: Irrelevant at
IrrelevantAt.Description: The threshold at which the bars become irrelevant and should only use numbers.
